preclusion: BMF5346 Venture Capital and Private Equity
description:
This course covers major private equity investment types including venture capital, growth capital and buyouts. The Course format will include lectures, interactive discussions, case studies and hands-on simulation. Topics will cover the entire private equity investment cycle from fund raising, structuring to deal screening, valuation, investment negotiations to post-investment value add and exits. 

An underlying theme  of the course is to evaluate to what extent venture capital and private equity markets can create value and wealth, generate social return and promote economic growth.
title: Venture Capital and Private Equity
